title: Japanese video games adapted into movies - box office revenue 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Film title (original writer company) in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and House Of The Dead (Sega) has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Film title (original writer company) is 298.6.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 11 number of Film title (original writer company)s.

Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and House Of The Dead (Sega) has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Film title (original writer company) in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and House Of The Dead (Sega) has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 11 number of Film title (original writer company)s.

Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars and House Of The Dead (Sega) has the lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The second highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: Afterlife (Capcom).
The difference of Revenue in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Film title (original writer company) is 298.6.

The Film title (original writer company) Resident Evil: The Final Chapter (Capcom) has the highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, followed by Resident Evil: Afterlife (Capcom), and Resident Evil: Retribution (Capcom). Down to the Film title (original writer company) House Of The Dead (Sega) which is the lowest.
The average Revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 11 Film title (original writer company)s is 140.93.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 1550.28 if we add up values of all Film title (original writer company)s.
